card.name: Bitron
card.description: A new species found in electronic space. There's not much information on it.

card.name: Draconnet
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Normal Monster from your hand or Deck in Defense Position.

card.name: RAM Clouder
card.description: You can Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 Cyberse monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "RAM Clouder" once per turn.

card.name: Linkslayer
card.description: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn: You can discard up to 2 cards, then target that many Spells/Traps on the field; destroy them.

card.name: Galaxy Serpent
card.description: Your hopes and dreams will be refreshed if you catch a glimpse of this rare creature in the evening twilight, soaring in the Sea of Stars.

card.name: Mystery Shell Dragon
card.description: Mysterious living matter that suddenly appeared from a different dimension. Its attack paralyzes the target's nerves, and causes intense hallucinations.

card.name: Beast King Barbaros
card.description: You can Normal Summon/Set this card without Tributing, but its original ATK becomes 1900. You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all cards your opponent controls.

card.name: Cyber Dragon
card.description: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

card.name: Photon Thrasher
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control no monsters. Cannot attack if you control another monster.

card.name: Exarion Universe
card.description: During your Battle Step, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: You can make this card lose exactly 400 ATK, and if it does, it will inflict piercing battle damage. These effects last until the end of this turn.

card.name: Evilswarm Mandragora
card.description: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

card.name: Marauding Captain
card.description: Your opponent cannot target Warrior monsters for attacks, except this one. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

card.name: Sangan
card.description: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Sangan" once per turn.

card.name: Kuribandit
card.description: During the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned this turn: You can Tribute this card; excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, you can add 1 excavated Spell/Trap to your hand, also send the remaining cards to the GY.

card.name: Marshmallon
card.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage.

card.name: Cardcar D
card.description: Cannot be Special Summoned. During your Main Phase 1, if this card was Normal Summoned this turn: You can Tribute this card; draw 2 cards, then it becomes the End Phase. You cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate this effect.

card.name: Ryko, Lightsworn Hunter
card.description: FLIP: Apply these effects (simultaneously).●You can destroy 1 card on the field.●Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY.

card.name: Battle Fader
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then end the Battle Phase. If Summoned this way, banish it when it leaves the field.

card.name: Swift Scarecrow
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

card.name: Effect Veiler
card.description: During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate the effects of that face-up monster your opponent controls, until the end of this turn.

card.name: Cynet Universe
card.description: All Link Monsters you control gain 300 ATK. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in the GY; shuffle it into the Deck. If this card on the field is destroyed by a card effect: Send all monsters in the Extra Monster Zones to the GY.

card.name: Monster Reincarnation
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster in your GY; add it to your hand.

card.name: Dark Hole
card.description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

card.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Book of Moon
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; change that target to face-down Defense Position.

card.name: Forbidden Lance
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; until the end of this turn, that target loses 800 ATK, but is unaffected by the effects of other Spells/Traps.

card.name: United We Stand
card.description: The equipped monster gains 800 ATK/DEF for each face-up monster you control.

card.name: Pot of Duality
card.description: Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, add 1 of them to your hand, also, after that, shuffle the rest back into your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Pot of Duality" per turn. You cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Burden of the Mighty
card.description: Each face-up monster your opponent controls loses 100 ATK x its own Level.

card.name: Supply Squad
card.description: Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Terraforming
card.description: Add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Jar of Avarice
card.description: Target 5 cards in your GY, except "Jar of Avarice"; shuffle all 5 into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Jar of Avarice" per turn.

card.name: Call of the Haunted
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Mirror Force
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

card.name: Torrential Tribute
card.description: When a monster(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsters on the field.

card.name: Ring of Destruction
card.description: During your opponent's turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls whose ATK is less than or equal to their LP; destroy that face-up monster, and if you do, take damage equal to its original ATK, then inflict damage to your opponent, equal to the damage you took. You can only activate 1 "Ring of Destruction" per turn.

card.name: Bottomless Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Summons a monster(s) with 1500 or more ATK: Destroy that monster(s) with 1500 or more ATK, and if you do, banish it.

card.name: Compulsory Evacuation Device
card.description: Target 1 monster on the field; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Fiendish Chain
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 Effect Monster on the field; negate the effects of that face-up monster while it is on the field, also that face-up monster cannot attack. When it is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Dark Bribe
card.description: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card: Your opponent draws 1 card, also negate the Spell/Trap activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Decode Talker
card.description: 2+ Effect MonstersGains 500 ATK for each monster it points to. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a card(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster this card points to; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

card.name: Honeybot
card.description: 2 Cyberse monstersNeither player can target monsters this card points to with card effects, and those monsters cannot be destroyed by battle.

card.name: Link Spider
card.description: 1 Normal MonsterOnce per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand to your zone this card points to.
